mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT A.WRK_ID , A.USER_EMAIL , C.WRK_LST_NM , C.PRJ_ID , B.USER_NM , D.PRJ_NM , A.WRK_LST_ID , A.WRK_RV_ID , A.WRK_PR_ID , A.WRK_NM , A.WRK_DT , A.WRK_GRADE , A.WRK_COLOR_CD , A.WRK_START_DT , A.WRK_END_DT , A.WRK_CMP_DT , A.WRK_CMP_FL , A.WRK_DEL_FL FROM WORK A, USERS B, WORK_LIST C, PROJECT D WHERE A.WRK_ID = #{WRK_ID} AND A.USER_EMAIL = B.USER_EMAIL AND A.WRK_LST_ID = C.WRK_LST_ID AND C.PRJ_ID = D.PRJ_ID AND A.WRK_START_DT is not null AND A.WRK_END_DT is not null
mapper.insert: insert into work values ( WRK_SEQ.nextVal, #{wrk_lst_id}, '', WRK_SEQ.nextVal, #{user_email}, #{wrk_nm}, sysdate, 'C', #{wrk_color_cd}, #{wrk_start_dt}, #{wrk_end_dt}, '', 'N', 'N' )
mapper.update: update work set WRK_DEL_FL = 'Y' where wrk_id = #{wrk_id}
update work set wrk_lst_id = #{wrk_lst_id}, wrk_nm = #{wrk_nm}, wrk_color_cd = #{wrk_color_cd}, wrk_start_dt = #{wrk_start_dt}, wrk_end_dt = #{wrk_end_dt} where wrk_id = #{wrk_id}
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT F.*, E.PRJ_ID, E.WRK_LST_NM, E.WRK_LST_DT, C.USER_NM, D.PRJ_NM FROM (SELECT * FROM PROJECT_MEM WHERE USER_EMAIL = #{USER_EMAIL}) A, PROJECT_MEM B, USERS C, PROJECT D, WORK_LIST E, WORK F WHERE C.USER_EMAIL = B.USER_EMAIL AND B.USER_EMAIL = F.USER_EMAIL AND B.PRJ_ID IN (A.PRJ_ID) AND B.PRJ_ID IN (D.PRJ_ID) AND D.PRJ_ID IN (E.PRJ_ID) AND E.WRK_LST_ID IN (F.WRK_LST_ID)
SELECT DISTINCT B.USER_EMAIL , C.USER_NM FROM ( SELECT * FROM PROJECT_MEM WHERE USER_EMAIL = #{USER_EMAIL}) A, PROJECT_MEM B, USERS C WHERE B.PRJ_ID IN (A.PRJ_ID) AND C.USER_EMAIL = B.USER_EMAIL
SELECT DISTINCT(A.PRJ_ID) , A.PRJ_NM FROM PROJECT A, PROJECT_MEM B WHERE A.PRJ_ID = B.PRJ_ID AND B.USER_EMAIL = #{USER_EMAIL} ORDER BY A.PRJ_ID
